Topic: Law
Context: Only Canadian films are shown at the Lac Nichoutec Film Festival. This year, most of the films that won prizes at that festival also won prizes at international film festivals.
Question: If the above statements are true, which one of the following statements must also be true?
Choices:
  A: This year, most of the Canadian films that were shown at international film festivals won prizes at the Lac Nichoutec Film Festival.
  B: Most of the Canadian Films produced this year were shown at the Lac Nichoutec Film Festival.
  C: Some of the films that won prizes at international film festivals this year were Canadian films.
  D: This year, not every film that won a prize at the Lac Nichoutec Film Festival was also shown at an international film festival.
  E: This year, at least one Film that won a prize at an international Film festival was not shown at the Lac Nichoutec Film Festival.
Reflection:

Then you reflected on the problem, your solution, and the correct answer.
Use your self-reflection (below) to help you answer this question.
Any information that you are not allowed to see will be marked [REDACTED].
Instructions:

My apologies for my previous mistake. I'll re-evaluate the question, considering my previous errors.

The given statements are:

1. Only Canadian films are shown at the Lac Nichoutec Film Festival.
2. Most of the films that won prizes at that festival also won prizes at international film festivals.

From statement 1, we know that all films shown at the Lac Nichoutec Film Festival are Canadian.
From statement 2, we know that most of the films that won prizes at the Lac Nichoutec Film Festival also won prizes at international film festivals.

Now, let's evaluate the choices:

A: This year, most of the Canadian films that were shown at international film festivals won prizes at the Lac Nichoutec Film Festival.
This choice is incorrect because the statement only mentions that most of the films that won prizes at the Lac Nichoutec Film Festival also won prizes at international film festivals. It doesn't necessarily mean that most of the Canadian films shown at international film festivals won prizes at the Lac Nichoutec Film Festival.

B: Most of the Canadian Films produced this year were shown at the Lac Nichoutec Film Festival.
This choice is incorrect because the statement only mentions that only Canadian films are shown at the Lac Nichoutec Film Festival, not that most of the Canadian films produced this year were shown at the festival.

C: Some of the films that won prizes at international film festivals this year were Canadian films.
This choice is correct. Since most of the films that won prizes at the Lac Nichoutec Film Festival also won prizes at international film festivals, and all films shown at the Lac Nichoutec Film Festival are Canadian, it follows that some of the films that won prizes at international film festivals this year were Canadian films.

D: This year, not every film that won a prize at the Lac Nichoutec Film Festival was also shown at an international film festival.
This choice is incorrect because the statement only mentions that most of the films that won prizes at the Lac Nichoutec Film Festival also won prizes at international film festivals. It doesn't necessarily mean that not every film that won a prize at the Lac Nichoutec Film Festival was also shown at an international film festival.

E: This year, at least one Film that won a prize at an international Film festival was not shown at the Lac Nichoutec Film Festival.
This choice is incorrect because the statement only mentions that most of the films that won prizes at the Lac Nichoutec Film Festival also won prizes at international film festivals. It doesn't necessarily mean that at least one film that won a prize at an international film festival was not shown at the Lac Nichoutec Film Festival.

Therefore, the correct answer is C: Some of the films that won prizes at international film festivals this year were Canadian films.
